partnerDetails.about:
BilfingerUK is a market leader in Automation consultancy, design, development,installation and commissioning. With extensive experience in highly regulatedenvironments combined with a strong focus on compliance and safety, we developsolutions that add value for our customers.

Ourhighly skilled Engineers have extensive experience of delivering a wide rangeof Schneider solutions including:

  • Modicon
  • Citect SCADA
  • GeoSCADA (ClearSCADA)
  • Intouch
  • System Platform
  • Historian

Bilfingerhas 11 offices providing engineering solutions to our customers across the UK,services include:

  • Consultation Services
  • FEED Studies
  • Design, Implementation and Commissioning ofAutomation Solutions – PLC, SCADA, DCS, RTU & Telemetry
  • Functional Safety
  • Industrial Networks
  • Cyber Security
  • Digitalisation
  • Industry 4.0 and IIOT
  • Energy Efficiency
  • Panel Design and Build – Control Panels, Drives,MCCs, LV & MV Switchgear
  • Asset Services and Support – 24/7/365 call outsupport, Preventative Maintenance and Obsolescence Management
